personalInfo.bio: I'm a passionate self-taught software developer learning coding from YouTube. I love building front-end and full-stack applications using modern tools like React and Appwrite.
personalInfo.detailedBio:
I'm a 16-year-old software developer from Skardu, Pakistan, currently in 9th grade. My passion for coding started when I discovered the power of creating applications that can solve real-world problems.

I've been teaching myself programming through YouTube tutorials and online resources. I'm particularly interested in front-end development with React and have been exploring full-stack development using modern tools like Appwrite.

When I'm not coding, I focus on my studies and continue learning new technologies to improve my skills. I enjoy building projects that challenge me and help me grow as a developer.

projects.title: Bus Ticket Booking Website
projects.description: A MERN stack application with login/signup, profile management, bookings, admin dashboard, and role-based routing (User/Admin/Company Admin).

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A React and TypeScript application that displays current weather information using an external API.

projects.title: Todo List App
projects.description: A full-stack app with user authentication and real-time data using React and Appwrite.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal website showcasing my skills and projects built with React and Tailwind CSS.

expertise.title: Frontend Development
expertise.description: Building responsive and interactive user interfaces with React, JavaScript, and modern CSS.

expertise.title: React Development
expertise.description: Creating dynamic web applications with React, focusing on component-based architecture and state management.

expertise.title: MERN Stack Development
expertise.description: Building end-to-end applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js for complete full-stack solutions.

expertise.title: Full Stack Development
expertise.description: Building end-to-end applications with React for frontend and Appwrite for backend services.

expertise.title: Problem Solving
expertise.description: Breaking down complex problems into manageable parts and implementing effective solutions.
